author.name: IDiceBattle
author.description: Dueling friends or the bot itself by rolling dices. With a level and experiences system according bonuses on your dices.
author.install_msg:
Thank you for installing the idicebattle cog.
Type `[p]help idice` and `[p]help IDiceBattle` for a quick overview of the commands
**This cog needs Bank, which must be loaded with `[p]load bank`.**
